attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Greedy politicians and bankers are the only group of people who are not to suffer in the economic crisis brought about by their stupidity.
Will the PM bring justice to this once great country?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
